not_used
==========

This files are not used anymore but might be handy for plotting or calculations.


.. module:: src.not_used


.. autofunction:: Brightness_T

.. autofunction:: vangenuchten

.. autofunction:: calculate_vert_profiles

These are useful for the visualization of results

.. autofunction:: plot_directional_figure4_function

.. autofunction:: resizefigure

.. autofunction:: progressbar


This functions are present inside RTMo as nested functions

.. autofunction:: e2phot

.. autofunction:: ephoton
